Binding.Expression:
LET $set := ARRAY( HASH("value", "Announcements", "text", "Announcements"), HASH("value", "Modules", "text", "Modules"), HASH("value", "Links", "text", "Links"), HASH("value", "Misc", "text", "Misc"), HASH("value", "Action", "text", "Sentence Builder") );
RETURN ARRAY_WHERE($set, $(i, item) $item <> NULL())

LET $set := ARRAY( HASH("value", "Announcements", "text", ""), HASH("value", "Modules", "text", ""), HASH("value", "Links", "text", ""), HASH("value", "Misc", "text", ""), HASH("value", "Action", "text", "") );
RETURN ARRAY_WHERE($set, $(i, item) $item <> NULL())

TextCriterion.Text: [Prompt 1]&' '&[Prompt 2]
CASE WHEN [Prompt Enabled] = TRUE THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END
CASE WHEN [Prompt Locked] = TRUE THEN 'System Builders ' ELSE 'Administrators' END
CASE WHEN [Prompt Module Dependent] = TRUE THEN 'Based on module' ELSE 'Based on role' END

Label.Text: Heading above image(s) - Use " | " delimiter for different headings for each image. E.g. Heading for image 1 | Heading for image 2 | Heading for image 3
Force image order - Enter the file name of each image with a " | " delimiter. The order of names will determine the order that the images will display.
Image navigation links - Website URLs with " | " delimiter (be sure to include https:// at the start of each link). If all images need to link to the same place you can just provide one link.

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $result := COALESCE( [Customer Name], ARRAY_LAST(SPLIT(EBMS_GET_BASE_URL(), "/")) );
RETURN IF( $result = "Core-Fresh", NULL, $result )

Event.Name: CENTRAL REPORTING - Post data to Client Central Reporting
Event.Description: Supports summary data and contract data

FormulaCriterion.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Settings - Contract", "[Central Reporting Enabled] = TRUE AND [Reporting System URL] <> NULL AND [Central Reporting Fields] <> NULL" ) <> NULL
DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Settings - Contract", "[Central Reporting Enabled] = TRUE AND [Reporting System URL] <> NULL AND [Central Reporting Fields] <> NULL" ) <> NULL

RaiseLinkedEForm.Description: CONTRACT DATA - Create Integration Event Record

FormulaCriterion.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Settings - Contract", "[Central Reporting Enabled] = TRUE AND [Reporting System URL] <> NULL AND [Central Reporting Fields] <> NULL" ) <> NULL
DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Global Settings", "[Client Central Reporting Enabled] = TRUE AND [Client Reporting System URL] <> NULL AND [Client Central Reporting Fields] <> NULL" ) <> NULL

RaiseLinkedEForm.Description: SUMMARY DATA - Create Integration Event Record

FormulaCriterion.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Global Settings", "[Client Central Reporting Enabled] = TRUE AND [Client Reporting System URL] <> NULL AND [Client Central Reporting Fields] <> NULL" ) <> NULL

Event.Name: CENTRAL REPORTING - Post data to Internal Central Reporting

FormulaCriterion.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Global Settings", "[Central Reporting Enabled] = TRUE AND [Reporting System URL] <> NULL AND [Central Reporting Fields] <> NULL" ) <> NULL

RaiseLinkedEForm.Description: SUMMARY DATA - Create Integration Event Record

FormulaCriterion.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Global Settings", "[Central Reporting Enabled] = TRUE AND [Reporting System URL] <> NULL AND [Central Reporting Fields] <> NULL" ) <> NULL

FieldEntry.Formula: DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY( "RecordID", "Company Name", "BusinessNumber" ), "Vendor", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [RecordID] IN " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Vendor RecordIDs]) )

FormulaDrivenRaiseLinkedEForm.FieldValuesFormula:
LET $standardData := HASH( "Status", "Active", "Cost Center", "Cost Center A", "Setup Complete", TRUE );
RETURN HASH_MERGE( $standardData, ARRAY_INDEX([Generated Contract Data], $count) )
